rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative directly modifying a risk-adjective.

The segment neutrally describes contract terms and triggers ('includes options to accelerate the development timeline if needed, based on an increase in human cases, the severity of cases or human-to-human transmission of the virus').
This segment discusses contract options based on case severity and contains no calming cue.
The segment does not contain a bare negation.
Describes a feature of a contract related to accelerating development ('options to accelerate the development timeline').
